sentences.en: As the wind blows we can hear the leaves rustle the trees.
sentences.cn: 刮风时,我们能听见树上的叶子发出飒飒的声音.

sentences.en: At length, save for an occasional rustle, the shelter was silent.
sentences.cn: 后来, 除了偶而的沙沙声外, 避难所里静寂无声.

sentences.en: Can you rustle up some men to help us?
sentences.cn: 你能找几个人来帮助我们 吗 ?

sentences.en: He listened to the rustle of her skirts.
sentences.cn: 他倾听她裙子的窸窣声.

sentences.en: He managed to rustle up a couple of blankets.
sentences.cn: 他很快想办法弄到了几张毯子。

sentences.en: He rustled the papers on his desk.
sentences.cn: 他把桌上的报纸翻得沙沙响。

sentences.en: He startled at the mere rustle of leaves in the wind.
sentences.cn: 他一有风吹草动就胆战心惊.

sentences.en: His ears were still hissing with the rustle of the leaves.
sentences.cn: 他耳朵里还听得萨萨萨的声音和屑索屑索的怪声.

sentences.en: I rustle up a few helpers to hand out leaflets.
sentences.cn: 我找到几个助手散发传单.

sentences.en: I'll buy it back just as soon as I rustle some cash.
sentences.cn: 我一弄到一些现金,就要把它买回来.

sentences.en: I'll rustle up some eggs and bacon for you.
sentences.cn: 我给你弄些鸡蛋和腌猪肉.

sentences.en: In the store they found the shine and rustle of new things.
sentences.cn: 在店里,他们看到时新货品琳琅满目.

sentences.en: RAFTER was not well received. At first it was just a rustle.
sentences.cn: “筏夫”并未受到欢迎.起初只是出现一阵低语声.

sentences.en: Rustle thy boughs and set thy trunk all bare.
sentences.cn: 风吹你的树干,满目凋零.

sentences.en: see if you can rustle up a cup of tea for Paula and me, please.
sentences.cn: 能否请你弄杯茶给我和保拉。

sentences.en: She heard a rustle in the bushes.
sentences.cn: 她听到灌木丛中一阵沙沙声.

sentences.en: She moved nearer, her long silk skirt rustling around her.
sentences.cn: 她走近了，真丝长裙窸窣作响。

sentences.en: Suddenly he heard a rustle in the peony pavilion and someone sighing deeply.
sentences.cn: 他忽闻有人在牡丹亭畔长吁短叹.

words.tran_cn: 发出沙沙声；使窸窣作响（rustle的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（在需要…时将其）快快做好，快快准备好

trans.tran_en: the noise made when something rustles
if leaves, papers, clothes etc rustle, or if you rustle them, they make a noise as they rub against each other
